des:
Your smart KooPower lights now connect to your Amazon Echo family of devices through the Alexa connected home. After a few easy setup steps, you can control your lights with Alexa.
How to use:
1. Download“KooPower”app：Scan the QR code printed on the package of KooPower devices to download the app and install into your smartphone, then create your KooPower account to login the app.
2. After assemble, to get the KooPower devices powered and ensure the lights are able to light on.
3. According to the index of the app, please create an area and add the new devices in to the area after search out any by automatical.
4. Please make sure you have KooPower's Smart Bridge and powered on, then click the Settings icon at the top left corner in the app to find "Smart Bridge Settings" menu to setup the smart bridge.
5. Enable this skill and link your KooPower account.
6. Next, discover you smart lights by saying "Alexa, Discover Devices" or by clicking the "Add Device" button in the Smart Home section of the Alexa app.
7. Now all setup is finished, you can simply ask Alexa to turn on, turn off or dimming the light. 

Once you know the name or group of your lights, you can say the following:
On/Off, Lights
 “Alexa, turn on bedroom light”
 “Alexa, turn off bedroom light”

Percentage, Dimmers
 “Alexa, set hallway light to 10 percent”
 “Alexa, brighten hallway light”
 “Alexa, dim family room”
 “Alexa, dim kitchen by 60 percent”
 “Alexa, brighten kitchen light by 80 percent”

Set Color
“Alexa, set the bedroom light to red”
“Alexa, change the kitchen to the color blue”
